name: Brand Concierge Reference Agent
description: A reference A2A agent implementation that integrates with Adobe Brand Concierge. Demonstrates how to build custom agents with skills for product recommendations, site navigation, and brand assistance. Orchestrated by Adobe Experience Platform Agent Orchestrator.

skills.name: Product Advisor
skills.description: Provides personalized product recommendations, comparisons, and detailed information based on customer needs and preferences.
examples: What laptop would you recommend for video editing?
Compare these two products for me
I'm looking for a gift under $100

skills.name: Site Navigator
skills.description: Helps users find content, navigate the site, and discover relevant resources based on their intent.
examples: Where can I find your return policy?
Show me your latest blog posts about sustainability
I need help finding customer support

skills.name: Brand Assistant
skills.description: Answers questions about the brand, provides company information, and maintains brand voice throughout interactions.
examples: Tell me about your company values
Do you have any current promotions?
